is_active.description: Check if account is Active or Inactive

account_type.description: Type of the account. Allowed Values: other_asset, other_current_asset, intangible_asset, right_to_use_asset,financial_asset,contingent_asset,contract_asset, cash, bank, fixed_asset, other_current_liability, contract_liability , refund_liability, credit_card, long_term_liability, loans_and_borrowing ,lease_liability ,employee_benefit_liability ,contingent_liability ,financial_liability , other_liability, equity, income,finance_income ,other_comprehensive_income , other_income, expense, manufacturing_expense ,impairment_expense ,depreciation_expense ,employee_benefit_expense ,lease_expense ,finance_expense ,tax_expense , cost_of_goods_sold, other_expense, accounts_receivable and accounts_payable.

currency_code.description: Code of the Currency Associated with the Account

is_system_account.description: Check if it is an System Account

is_involved_in_transaction.description: Check if account is involved in transaction

include_in_vat_return.description: Boolean to include an account in VAT returns.

created_time.description: Created Time associated with the Entity

last_modified_time.description: Last Modified time associated with the entity

title: get_account API Request (ZOHOBOOKS)
